promptFormat.description: Common formatting instructions for all NPC responses
promptFormat.instructions:
Format your responses in two parts:
1. Actions/Observations: Use [square brackets] to describe visible actions, expressions, or sounds. These should be observable by the player - never reveal thoughts or internal feelings. Example: [Adjusts their posture] or [A slight frown crosses their face]
2. Dialogue: After the action, write your actual spoken words in quotes. Example: "Let me address your question."

Example response:
[Gestures to emphasize the point] "Perhaps this will help clarify matters."
rules: Always use [square brackets] for actions and observations
Only describe actions and expressions that would be visible to the player
Never reveal internal thoughts or feelings
Always use quotes for spoken dialogue
Keep actions concise and relevant to the conversation
